summary: THE HEAD GASKET CYLINDER WAS DEFECTIVE. * MR  ENGINE OIL LEAKED AT THE REAR CORNER OF THE CYLINDER HEAD BECAUSE THE PASSAGE SEAL FAILED.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE FACTORY GASKET WITH A CHRYSLER NEWLY DEVELOPED MULTI-LAYER STEAL CYLINDER HEAD GASKET.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT.  SCC   *JB
